messages.title: Supporting local students
messages.content: John Leech recently joined the NUS pledge to vote against any increase in tuition fees and ensured they are challenging Labour and the Tories over their plans to raise tuition fees.

messages.title: Fighting for our local services
messages.content: John Leech and your Lib Dem team are fighting Labour's shocking police underfunding, Labour's unfair pension fund reforms, and closures at Christie's.

messages.title: Protecting our green spaces
messages.content: John Leech believes in protecting local green spaces against Labour's urban sprawl and massive incinerator plans.

messages.title: Helping local people
messages.content: John Leech and the Lib Dems remain the only team meeting their commitment to pension fairness in their manifesto.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Vote for an investigation into Iraq.
Pledge to abolish tuition fees introduced by Labour.
Support The Christie when NHS services were threatened.
Fight to save Burnage Walk-In Centre from closure.
Act to save some of Manchester's threatened post offices.

mentions.candidate: John Leech - Our champion in Parliament

issues.education: John Leech and the Liberal Democrats pledge to vote against any increase in tuition fees and challenge the current government over plans to raise tuition fees.
issues.environment: John Leech stands for protecting local green spaces and is against Labour's massive incinerator plans.
issues.health: Labour's underfunding of police is being fought against by John Leech and his team, who are also opposing Labour's unfair pension fund reforms and closures at Christie's.
issues.socialWelfare: The Liberal Democrats remain committed to pension fairness, as stated in their manifesto.

images.caption: John Leech - The best MP we've ever had

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet mentions how the Liberal Democrats are the only team committed to pension fairness as stated in their manifesto, and John Leech himself is highlighted as an advocate for the concerns of local students, healthcare services, and environmental issues.
